title: JCR: Taming the Gods: How Religious Conflict Shapes State Repression
description: Authors Peter Henne and Jason Kocek discuss their article, "Taming the Gods: How Religious Conflict Shapes State Repression," to be published in a forthcoming issue of Journal of Conflict Resolution.
content:encoded: Authors Peter Henne and Jason Kocek discuss their article, "Taming the Gods: How Religious Conflict Shapes State Repression," to be published in a forthcoming issue of Journal of Conflict Resolution.
